short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Will show the workflow name of the actions, when editing a Oozie Workflow in Hue

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The actual ID of Oozie Workflow Actions can be hidden, when viewing it in Hue.
To fix this, this extension will add the ID, after the pretty name.
